consumables.description: A delicious slice of spiced pumpkin pie with a flaky crust. Provides sustained healing over time when consumed. Heals 2000 HP over 10 seconds.

consumables.description: A hefty leg from a fallen killer turkey. The meat is tough and faintly warmâ€”best cooked before it starts moving again.

consumables.description: A magical stone that can bring you back to life. Revives to %50 health.

Roasted Turkey Leg
consumables.description: A rich, savory meal crafted from tender turkey and wild sage. A seasonal favorite said to revive the spirit as well as the body. Heals 2000 HP over 10 seconds.
A powerful scroll that allows you to choose a new character class. Your stats will be reset to the new class starting values.

effects.description: Allows selection of a new character class

consumables.name: Scroll of Class Reset

consumables.description: An ancient scroll that resets both your character class and all stat allocations. Choose a new class and redistribute all your stat points.

effects.description: Resets both character class and all stat points

consumables.name: Scroll of Complete Reset

consumables.description: A mystical scroll that allows you to change your character name. Your previous name will be recorded in your profile history for tracking purposes.

effects.description: Allows you to change your character name

consumables.name: Scroll of Name Change

consumables.description: A mystical scroll that allows you to redistribute all your allocated stat points. Your character level and class remain unchanged.

effects.description: Resets all allocated stat points for redistribution

consumables.name: Scroll of Stat Reset
Steel Sword Recipe Scroll
consumables.description: A scroll containing the knowledge to craft steel swords.

consumables.name: Wild Honey
consumables.description: Sweet honey found near bear dens.
Increases strength by 15 for 3 minutes.
consumables.name: Potion of Might

consumables.description: Increases attack speed by 20% for 2 minutes.

consumables.description: Greatly increases damage and attack speed but reduces defense.

consumables.description: Grants complete invincibility for 30 seconds. Extremely rare.

consumables.description: Enhances all combat abilities dramatically for 10 minutes.

effects.description: +30 all stats, +40% attack speed, +20% crit chance, +50% crit damage

consumables.name: Master's Supreme Elixir

allItems.name: Coin Purse
allItems.description: A magical purse that grows in power. Protects a minimum of 5,000 gold OR your level percentage - whichever is greater! Upgrade with Echoes at the Blacksmith to protect more.

tattered.name: Tattered
tattered.description: A humble beginning for every adventurer
tattered.unlockMessage: You have acquired a Tattered Coin Purse! Upgrade it with Echoes to protect more gold.

stitched.name: Stitched
stitched.description: Trusted by merchants across the realm
stitched.unlockMessage: Your dedication has not gone unnoticed. The craftsmen have reinforced your purse with stitched fittings!

reinforced.name: Reinforced
reinforced.description: A symbol of wealth and status
reinforced.unlockMessage: The guild recognizes your wealth. Silver threads now weave through your purse, a mark of true prosperity!

ornate.name: Ornate
ornate.description: For the kings and queens of the realm.
ornate.unlockMessage: You have proven yourself worthy. The royal beings have bestowed their blessing upon you!

royal.name: Royal
royal.description: Legendary protection, for kings and queens. For those who have proven themselves worthy.
royal.unlockMessage: You have proven yourself worthy. The royal beings have bestowed their blessing upon you!
royal.maxLevelMessage: ðŸ‘‘ You now have a Royal Coin Purse! Your wealth is protected by the mightiest magic known to the realm.

mythic.name: Mythic
mythic.description: For the gods themselves. 100% gold protection.
mythic.unlockMessage: You have proven yourself worthy. The gods have bestowed their blessing upon you!
mythic.maxLevelMessage: âœ¨ You now have a Mythic Coin Purse! Your wealth is 100% protected - you will never lose gold on death!

spriteOverrides._comment: Lookup priority: subtype -> type -> default. Keys can be subtypes OR types.

default._comment: Ultimate fallback if no subtype or type match

cosmeticData.effectDescription: Wraps your item with festive red and white candy cane stripes!

allItems.name: Candy Cane Wrap
allItems.description: A festive candy cane themed wrap! Apply this to any weapon, armor, or tool to give it a sweet holiday look with red and white stripes.

allItems.description: A gnarly bough torn from a corrupted treeman, still humming with cold sap and forest rot. Itâ€™s not much on its own, but in the right handsâ€”and a hot kitchenâ€”it can be shaped into a proper Yule tree.

allItems.description: A handcrafted Yule tree built from a corrupted treemanâ€™s bough, crowned with candlelight and bound in bone and antler. Its needles glimmer with quiet winter magic, filling the air with a comforting, frost-sweet glow.

allItems.description: A legendary crown that amplifies critical hit damage.
allItems.name: Crown of Devastating Strikes
Adamant Helmet
allItems.description: A polished adamant helmet providing excellent head protection. Suitable for all warrior classes.

allItems.name: Adventurer Starter Bundle
allItems.description: A special bundle containing essential items for new adventurers.

allItems.name: Crystal Vial
allItems.description: A high-quality crystal container for potions.

allItems.name: Cursed Hollow Jack-o'-Lantern
allItems.description: A black pumpkin whose sage-smoked candle burns a toxic neon green. Its eyes shimmer with life unholy, a reminder that even the dead envy the warmth of flame.

allItems.name: Dungeon Key
allItems.description: A mysterious key that unlocks access to special dungeon content.

allItems.name: Enchanted Bloom Jack-o'-Lantern
allItems.description: Born of red and blue pumpkins, its wildflower-scented flame dances like rose-colored smoke behind violet glass. Villagers say it glows brightest when lovers share secrets beneath its light.

allItems.name: Glass Vial
allItems.description: A small glass container for potions.

allItems.name: Legendary Vial
allItems.description: A vial crafted from the rarest materials.

allItems.name: Purified Water
allItems.description: Magically purified water for advanced alchemy.

allItems.name: Quick Slot Upgrade (2nd Slot)
allItems.description: A special upgrade token that unlocks your 2nd quick slot for instant access to healing items and consumables.

allItems.name: Quick Slot Upgrade (3rd Slot)
allItems.description: A special upgrade token that unlocks your 3rd quick slot for even faster access to consumables and potions.

allItems.name: Quick Slot Upgrade (4th Slot)
allItems.description: A special upgrade token that unlocks your 4th quick slot for maximum convenience in combat and exploration.

allItems.name: Quick Slot Upgrade (5th Slot)
allItems.description: A special upgrade token that unlocks your 5th quick slot for ultimate convenience and tactical advantage.

allItems.name: Rusty Weapon
allItems.description: Old, damaged weapon that can be salvaged for materials.

allItems.name: Solar Grove Jack-o'-Lantern
allItems.description: A bright green pumpkin carved with care and filled with ginseng oil. When lit, its orange eyes flicker like dawn through leaves â€” a beacon of life and warmth.

allItems.name: Ultimate Quick Slot Bundle
allItems.description: A premium upgrade bundle that unlocks ALL remaining quick slots at once! Maximum convenience for serious players.

allItems.name: Violet Reaper Jack-o'-Lantern
allItems.description: A cursed pumpkin carved to lure lost souls. Its lavender-infused flame burns an unholy violet, twisting the grin into a sneer of malice. Locals whisper that those who stare too long into its eyes see the Reaper's shadow waiting behind the glass.

allItems.name: Water
allItems.description: Pure water for crafting.

allItems.name: Weapon
allItems.description: A basic weapon salvaged from enemies.

allItems.name: Wisp-Eyed Jack-o'-Lantern
allItems.description: A pale white pumpkin whose candle is laced with mushroom spores. When lit, its eyes blaze crimson like the embers of a forgotten forest spirit.

allItems.name: Old Weapon
allItems.description: Old weapon found with undead, may have magical properties.

allItems.name: Vampire Cloak
allItems.description: A mystical cloak once worn by a vampire.

allItems.name: Blessed Weapon
allItems.description: A weapon blessed by divine forces. Too holy to handle.

allItems.name: Infernal Weapon
allItems.description: A weapon forged in the fires of hell.

allItems.name: Legendary Armor
allItems.description: Incredibly rare armor materials of legendary quality.

allItems.name: Legendary Weapon
allItems.description: An incredibly powerful weapon material of legendary quality.
An ancient amulet that grants incredible mining power.
allItems.name: Amulet of Endless Labor

A rare crystal pulsing with divine energy. Required for high-level enhancements.
allItems.name: Divine Enhancement Crystal

allItems.description: Fine pollen collected from wild flowers. Essential for advanced alchemy recipes.

allItems.description: The heart of a giant, pulsing with raw power.

allItems.description: A small hand-poured candle made from pine resin and bound with plant fiber.

allItems.name: Healing Herb
allItems.description: A common herb with healing properties.
Refined iron used for crafting weapons and tools.
allItems.name: Iron Ingot
Iron Ingot
allItems.description: A refined iron ingot, smelted from iron ore. Fundamental material for weapons and tools.

allItems.name: Iron Ore
allItems.description: Raw iron that can be smelted into iron ingots.

allItems.name: Krampus Cane
